response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed to provide unparalleled performance and efficiency, making it an invaluable asset for your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering the high quality and exceptional capabilities of this product, I am extending you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only, so I encourage you to make your decision promptly. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 9500}
